dialogue.introduction: Hello! I-58 here! You can call me Goya. I'm not bitter!
dialogue.library_intro: I have fought hard from the beginning to the end. Even when the war had became harsh, I managed to take down that heavy cruiser! After fulfilling my mission and everything was all over, I managed to make it back safely to Kure, my home port.
dialogue.secretary1: Hello from beneath the sea! Goya here!
dialogue.secretary2: Phew! It's lovely good in the sea. Nothing begins unless I dive!
dialogue.secretary3: If it's armour, it has to be a school swimsuit! Look, it's efficiently smooth!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Do your best with your KanColle study!
dialogue.wedding: Being with the Admiral is so much fun! You know, there are lots of fish that only live in the south, they're worth seeing, yeah? This time, I'll take you there!
dialogue.show_players_score: Communication for the Admiral? Lemme see!
dialogue.equipment2: Admiral, I don't really need this...
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been finished! Anyhow, it's an above-water ship, isn't it?
dialogue.battle_start: Wa~ I found a lot of scary things!
dialogue.air_battle: Goya's torpedos - they're clever little things!
dialogue.night_attack: Goya's torpedos - they're clever little things!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Goya's torpedos - they're clever little things!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Goya's torpedos - they're clever little things!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Goya's torpedos - they're clever little things!
dialogue.mvp: Goya, she did her best, yes? Eh? Chanpuru? I'm not a side dish, you know~
dialogue.moderately_damaged: My swimsuit, a functional beauty & designated by the Admiral, is...
dialogue.sunk: Someday, Goya wants to dream of the day I met you all... diving deep....

hourly.0200: 0200. Oh... There is something behind... Ah well, forget it.
hourly.0700: 0700. If nothing else, eat some breakfast.
hourly.0800: 0800. What kind of day will today be, I wonder?
hourly.0900: 0900. 9 o'clock. Where are you taking 58 today?
hourly.1000: A~dmiral. 1000. I'd like a new swimsuit soon~
hourly.1100: 1100. A~dmiral~, I wanna try on this fluttery swimsuit too~
hourly.1200: 1200~. After lunch, let's look at more swimsuits!
hourly.1300: 1300. Ah, Admiral, why don't we take a nap?
hourly.1900: 1900. I should study sometime... It's gotta be German, yeah?
hourly.2100: 2100. Ice-cream for dessert is great, yeah? Mamiya-san, come o~n!
